docs.snippet: Mark Sanchez’s knack for committing costly turnovers resurfaced. Geno Smith, also competing for the Jets’ starting quarterback job, injured an ankle but said he would be fine....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mark Sanchez’s knack for committing costly turnovers resurfaced. Geno Smith, also competing for the Jets’ starting quarterback job, injured an ankle but said he would be fine.
docs.abstract: Ben Shpigel On Pro Football column; New York Jets lose preseason opener to Detroit Lions, 26-17; Jets quarterback Mark Sanchez goes 10 of 13 passing for 125 yards, with one touchdown and one interception; Geno Smith, Sanchez's competitor for the starting job, leaves in third quarter with ankle injury.

headline.main: Sanchez Throws for Two Touchdowns, One for Each Team
headline.print_headline: Sanchez Throws for Two Touchdowns, One for Each Team

docs.snippet: Tom Brady looked sharp in a preseason game for the Patriots, while the Eagles picked up where they left off — with a loss....
docs.lead_paragraph: Tom Brady looked sharp in a preseason game for the Patriots, while the Eagles picked up where they left off — with a loss.
docs.abstract: NFL Roundup; New England Patriots defeat Philadelphia Eagles, 31-22, in preseason game; other football news noted.

docs.snippet: Sam Madison, who helped the Giants win a Super Bowl while mentoring a young secondary, is no longer playing, but he is at training camp with the next generation of students....
docs.lead_paragraph: Sam Madison, who helped the Giants win a Super Bowl while mentoring a young secondary, is no longer playing, but he is at training camp with the next generation of students.
docs.abstract: Sam Madison, retired Pro-Bowl cornerback who helped New York Giants win a Super Bowl while mentoring a young secondary, returns to team's training camp to help groom a new generation of defensive backs.

headline.main: Madison Returns to Giants, but Don’t Call Him ‘Coach’
headline.print_headline: Mentor Returns to Giants, but Don’t Call Him ‘Coach’

docs.abstract: Former Vanderbilt football players Cory Batey, Brandon Banks, Jaborian McKenzie and Brandon Vandenburg are indicted on five counts each of aggravated rape of an unconscious 21-year-old female student at a dormitory.

docs.snippet: Investigators searching for the gun used to kill a semi-pro football player are looking into whether former New England Patriots tight end Aaron Hernandez asked his girlfriend to get rid of the weapon shortly after the victim's body was found abou...
docs.lead_paragraph: Investigators searching for the gun used to kill a semi-pro football player are looking into whether former New England Patriots tight end Aaron Hernandez asked his girlfriend to get rid of the weapon shortly after the victim's body was found about a mile from his home.
